title.en: The Pulsing Breath of Emerald Light

description.ko: 식물적 질감과 생물 발광 유체 역학을 결합하여 빛을 호흡하는 유기적 하이브리드 구조를 심해에서 탐사하는 장면입니다.
description.en: A deep-sea exploration of an organic hybrid structure that breathes light, blending botanical textures with bioluminescent fluid dynamics.

prompt: An ultra-macro cinematic masterpiece of AURA-7, featuring a colossal, pulsating lung-flower hybrid composed of translucent #7FB069 emerald moss and #2D5A3D vascular networks. The entity is suspended in a deep-sea atmospheric void, inhaling swirling #E6F2E1 bioluminescent spores that resemble a miniature galaxy. Rhythmic #FFE66D liquid sap flows through the mossy membranes, creating an internal living glow. Rendered in Unreal Engine 5 with Octane Render, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic fluid dynamics of liquid light, volumetric light shafts, and microscopic texture of organic breathing.
